about_the_game:
Paper Caper is a rogue-like card crawler with the unique graphic style of "Help I can't draw" that somehow manages to not look too bad. In Paper Caper, you traverse a map, upgrading your deck and fighting a wide variety of enemies and bosses along the way. A mix-and-match ascension system and the random nature of each run keeps the game replayable.

Features:

  • A journal to keep track of everything you've encountered.
  • A miniscule sprinkling of inconsistent lore in between the gameplay.
  • An ascension system allowing you to customize your runs to make them easier or harder.
  • Enough balance to be fun.

The game is being constant worked on, and will be released when it's ready, so wishlist it or join the discord server to stay updated!

name: Paper Caper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Paper Caper is a rogue-like card crawler with a minimalistic, hand drawn art style. Explore a maze and prepare you deck to overcome the final boss.
